description: Shy's roommate Patrick has once again forgotten to pay the bills on time. When confronted he acts like a smart ass and tells Shy she should do it herself! It is insolence like this that results in some harsh discipline and a side of Shy Love we have never seen before. Thorough OTK spanking, tight CBT, masturbation and a strist lesson in ass worship leave Patrick in a very submissive state of mind...but when threatened with Shy's strap on cock, he again resists...hasn't he learnt by now...a strong women will always get her way!
title: shy love and Patrick
